input.sentences: a guest at the wedding takes a picture of the photographer .
the children play on the floor .
finally the bride and groom enter .
a speech is given for them .
output.sentences: The camera man takes one picture at the wedding.
Afterwords he would talk and mingle with guests.
He would rather play on the floor with children
Finally he decided to enter and photograph the groom
Before he left he gave a speech.
